resources.string: Your goal should be clear and specific, otherwise you won\'t be able to focus your efforts or feel truly motivated to achieve it. When creating a goal, try to answer the five W\'s (What, Why, Who, Where, Which)
Quantify your goals so you can track your progress and stay motivated. Assessing progress helps you to stay focused.
Your goal needs to be realistic and attainable to be successful. Stretch your abilities but ensure the goal remains possible.
Your goal should matter to you and also aligns with other relevant goals. Ensure your goal is worthwhile.
Every goal needs a target date so that you have a deadline to focus on and something to work towards.
